title: Scanning is taking ages, can't play as a result.
body: When I log into the league server today, it is constantly trying to scan every file in the league folder before giving me the option to hit play or create lobbies or anything. This wouldn't be an issue, if it weren't for the fact that after 10+ minutes I am still at 0% because it has only gone through 3000 files.

replies.body:
Because of the sheer number of game files league has, it's normal for you to hit 3000 files scanned and still be at 0%. There's not much we can do on our end to help the patcher scan faster, so my best advice is to just let the patcher do it's thing =\ . 

Try not to interrupt the scan until it's finished, since any interruptions could cause some files to become corrupted.
